subject: Scholarships and Fellowships
College Athletics
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
lead_paragraph: An athlete’s worth to a college is often negotiated behind the closed doors, but the figures tend to get out. What happens next is not surprising: scholarship envy.
snippet: An athlete’s worth to a college is often negotiated behind the closed doors, but the figures tend to get out. What happens next is not surprising: scholarship envy.
